pullrequest.title: Changes to bullet link param init

content.raw:
Checking for negative values is already there.

Added checking for zeros earlier in the function. I also set it to a small value if it's zero because bullet does not allow setting fixed size values after a shape has been created, instead it lets you scale it. So an initial size of 0 can never be resized later, hence setting a small value
content.html:
Checking for negative values is already there.

Added checking for zeros earlier in the function. I also set it to a small value if it's zero because bullet does not allow setting fixed size values after a shape has been created, instead it lets you scale it. So an initial size of 0 can never be resized later, hence setting a small value
